abstract: Governments across Europe remained at odds over whether to scale back nuclear power programs. China is suspending new plant approvals until it can strengthen safety standards.
snippet: Governments across Europe remained at odds over whether to scale back nuclear power programs. China is suspending new plant approvals until it can strengthen safety standards.
lead_paragraph: As Japan’s nuclear crisis intensified Wednesday, governments across Europe remained at odds over whether to scale back nuclear power programs or continue plans to expand, while China announced that it was suspending new plant approvals until it could strengthen safety standards.

headline.main: In Europe and China, Japan’s Crisis Renews Fears About Nuclear Power
headline.print_headline: In Europe and China, Japan’s Crisis Renews Fears About Nuclear Power
